Learn

Frank Phillips was a banker, oilman, community leader, and friend to many. He created Woolaroc in 1925 and the property has been utilized ever since to preserve the history of the West, educate, and entertain. Over 10 million visitors from near and far have entered our front gate over the years and it is our privilege to share this special place for your enjoyment!

  • Learn More

How to support

Join

Membership offers incredible perks and benefits: unlimited free admission, access to 1,000+ other museums, members’ only events, special discounts, and much more!

  • View Memberships

Donate

As a nonprofit, your generous support helps us to preserve and operate our historic property for current and future generations to enjoy. All donations are tax-deductible, too!

  • Donate Now

SHOP

The Woolaroc Gift Shop has something for everyone! Shop now and find your perfect Woolaroc souvenir.

  • SHOP NOW

Tickets

Purchase your tickets online to speed up the admission process OR simply purchase them at our front gate on the day of your visit. Your choice!

  • Buy Tickets

LOOKING FOR A ONE-OF-A-KIND VENUE FOR YOUR SPECIAL OCCASION?

Woolaroc has hosted U.S. Presidents, Hollywood Celebrities, Native American Chiefs, and Foreign Dignitaries. Now you can host your own memorable event here, too!
